benifit: Showcase incomplete/unpublished research problems through presentations to a supportive peer group, receive feedback, and enrich your research.
Post-presentation deliberations with compatible researchers for collaborative work.
Suggestions for improvement and possibly a fruitful collaboration with renowned researchers.
Interacting directly with both peers and experienced researchers of CALDAM.
Learn about the research areas of your peers and get exposed to recent trends in research.
Inspiration and motivation to college students to pursue a research career.
